text: Madonna and Child with Two Angels (also known as La Madonna e il figlio con due angeli) is a 18th-century portrait painted in oil by Giambattista Pittoni, made around 1725, during the Rococo in Venice, Italy, exhibited at the National Museum, Warsaw.National Museum, Warsaw inv. n. M.Ob.209 == References == ==Other websites== * National Museum, Warsaw inv. n. M.Ob.209 Category:1720s paintings Category:Paintings by Giambattista Pittoni
title: Madonna and Child with Two Angels (Pittoni)
